game.name: EVE Online: Level 2 Mastery pack
game.genres: Action, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Trading Cards
game.shortDescription: 더 강한 힘으로 더 많은 기회를 잡으세요. 오메가 시간 1개월, PLEX, 스킬 포인트로 빠르게 스킬을 훈련하거나 ISK로 거래하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: More power, more possibilities. Get 1 month of Omega, PLEX, and Skill Points to accelerate training, trade for ISK, or customize your experience in New Eden.
